title: Add interactive launch roadmap section to homepage

requirements.text: Add a new roadmap section on the homepage that displays a prominent Launch button showing the DEX soft launch date of March 31st as a visual indicator

quotes: Add a Launch button in a roadmap that Lostwold coin launch 31 March on dex for intial expansion of wolf world
The Launch button should be a visual indicator as well a clickable

acceptanceCriteria: Launch button is prominently displayed in a roadmap section on the homepage
Button clearly shows the date March 31st as the DEX launch date
Button has an eye-catching design that fits the wolf/pack theme

requirements.text: Make the Launch button clickable to reveal detailed Wolf Pack launch information including the soft launch on DEX (March 31st) with 'Initial Expansion of Wolf World' description and the Tier 1 exchange launch approximately 3 months later (end of June)

quotes: after someone click on it it shows the further details about the launching of the wolf pack
consider a sof launch on Dex after 3 month coin will launch on Tier 1 exchange

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Launch button opens a modal or expands a section with detailed launch information
Details include Soft Launch on DEX (March 31st) with phase description 'Initial Expansion of Wolf World'
Details include Tier 1 Exchange Launch milestone approximately 3 months after soft launch (around end of June)
The expanded view presents the roadmap phases in a clear, visually appealing timeline format

requirements.text: Integrate the new roadmap section seamlessly into the existing homepage layout using consistent styling, animations, and theme elements matching the wolf/pack aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Roadmap section is positioned appropriately within the homepage flow
Section uses consistent color scheme, typography, and spacing from existing components
Animations and transitions match the style of other homepage sections
Section is fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports

constraints: Do not modify existing Roadmap.tsx component; create a new launch-specific roadmap component
Maintain existing homepage section order and layout
Use existing hooks like useInView for scroll animations to maintain consistency
nonGoals: Backend integration for launch dates or dynamic roadmap content
User authentication or personalized launch notifications
Integration with external DEX platforms or exchange APIs
Email notifications or countdown timers beyond visual display
